alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:55PM CDT until June 16 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL COOKE COUNTY... At 1154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Muenster, or 17 miles west of Gainesville, moving east at 30 mph. At 1152 PM CDT, half dollar size hail was reported near St Jo. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Muenster, Lindsay, Callisburg, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Lake Kiowa, Walnut Bend, Bulcher, Sturgeon, Marysville, Woodbine, Dexter, Myra and Sivells Bend. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
